role.label: Accounts Payable, Current

role.terseLabel: Certificates of deposit and time deposits
role.label: Bank Time Deposits [Member]
role.documentation: Certificates of deposit (CD) or savings accounts with a fixed term or understanding the customer can only withdraw by giving advanced notice with a bank or other financial institution. A CD is a short to medium-term investment available at banks and savings and loan institutions where a customer agrees to lend money to the institution for a certain amount of time and is paid a predetermined rate of interest.

role.label: Basis of Accounting, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for basis of accounting, or basis of presentation, used to prepare the financial statements (for example, US Generally Accepted Accounting Principles, Other Comprehensive Basis of Accounting, IFRS).

role.label: Basis of Presentation and Significant Accounting Policies [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for the basis of presentation and significant accounting policies concepts. Basis of presentation describes the underlying basis used to prepare the financial statements (for example, US Generally Accepted Accounting Principles, Other Comprehensive Basis of Accounting, IFRS). Accounting policies describe all significant accounting policies of the reporting entity.

role.label: Cash
role.documentation: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
role.documentation: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

role.totalLabel: Cash, Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities, Fair Value
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities
role.documentation: Amount of currency on hand plus amount of investments in marketable equity securities (FV-NI) and marketable debt securities (available-for-sale).

role.totalLabel: Cash, Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities, Adjusted Cost
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities, Cost
role.documentation: Amount of currency on hand plus cost of investments in marketable equity securities (FV-NI) and marketable debt securities (available-for-sale).

role.periodStartLabel: Cash, cash equivalents, and restricted cash and cash equivalents, beginning balances
role.periodEndLabel: Cash, cash equivalents, and restricted cash and cash equivalents, ending balances
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.totalLabel: Increase/(Decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and restricted cash and cash equivalents
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.totalLabel: Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities, Unrealized Gains
role.label: Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain on investments in marketable equity securities (FV-NI) and marketable debt securities (available-for-sale).

role.negatedTotalLabel: Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities, Unrealized Losses
role.label: Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss on investments in marketable equity securities (FV-NI) and marketable debt securities (available-for-sale).

role.label: Cash [Member]
role.documentation: Currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits.

role.label: Class of Stock [Domain]
role.documentation: Share of stock differentiated by the voting rights the holder receives. Examples include, but are not limited to, common stock, redeemable preferred stock, nonredeemable preferred stock, and convertible stock.

role.label: Commercial Paper
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of short-term borrowings using unsecured obligations issued by banks, corporations and other borrowers to investors. The maturities of these money market securities generally do not exceed 270 days.

role.label: Commercial Paper [Member]
role.documentation: Unsecured promissory note (generally negotiable) that provides institutions with short-term funds.

role.label: Commitments and Contingencies
role.documentation: Represents the caption on the face of the balance sheet to indicate that the entity has entered into (1) purchase or supply arrangements that will require expending a portion of its resources to meet the terms thereof, and (2) is exposed to potential losses or, less frequently, gains, arising from (a) possible claims against a company's resources due to future performance under contract terms, and (b) possible losses or likely gains from uncertainties that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events that are deemed likely to occur do occur or fail to occur.

role.terseLabel: Dividends and dividend equivalents declared per share or RSU (in dollars per share or RSU)
role.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
role.documentation: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

role.terseLabel: Common stock and additional paid-in capital
role.label: Common Stock Including Additional Paid in Capital [Member]

role.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
role.documentation: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

role.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
role.documentation: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

role.terseLabel: Common stock and additional paid-in capital, $0.00001 par value: 50,400,000 shares authorized; 14,939,315 and 15,116,786 shares issued and outstanding, respectively

role.documentation: The denominator in a calculation of a disclosed concentration risk percentage.

role.label: Concentration Risk Benchmark [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by benchmark of concentration risk.

role.label: Concentration Risk Type [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of concentration risk, for example, but not limited to, asset, liability, net assets, geographic, customer, employees, supplier, lender.

role.label: Concentration Risk, Percentage
role.documentation: For an entity that discloses a concentration risk in relation to quantitative amount, which serves as the "benchmark" (or denominator) in the equation, this concept represents the concentration percentage derived from the division.

role.label: Concentration Risk Type [Domain]
role.documentation: For an entity that discloses a concentration risk as a percentage of some financial balance or benchmark, identifies the type (for example, asset, liability, net assets, geographic, customer, employees, supplier, lender) of the concentration.

role.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
role.documentation: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

role.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current

role.terseLabel: Portion of total net sales that was included in deferred revenue as of the beginning of the period
role.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
role.documentation: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

role.label: Corporate Debt Securities [Member]
role.documentation: Debt securities issued by domestic or foreign corporate business, banks and other entities with a promise of repayment.

role.label: Segment Reporting, Reconciling Item, Corporate Nonsegment [Member]
role.documentation: Corporate headquarters or functional department that may not earn revenues or may earn revenues that are only incidental to the activities of the entity and is not considered an operating segment.

role.label: Cost of Goods and Services Sold
role.documentation: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

role.label: Cover [Abstract]
role.documentation: Cover page.

role.label: Credit Concentration Risk [Member]
role.documentation: Reflects the percentage that a specified receivable or amount at risk from a counterparty under a contractual arrangement is to a specified benchmark, such as total receivables, net revenues, pretax results. Risk is the materially adverse effects of loss attributable to (a) the failure to collect a significant receivable from a major customer or group of homogeneous accounts, or (b) a failure by a counterparty to perform under terms of a contractual arrangement.

role.verboseLabel: Hedges of foreign currency exposure associated with term debt
role.label: Cross Currency Interest Rate Contract [Member]
role.documentation: Derivative instrument whose primary underlying risk is tied to interest rates and foreign exchange rates.

role.label: Current Fiscal Year End Date
role.documentation: End date of current fiscal year in the format --MM-DD.

role.label: Debt Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for information about short-term and long-term debt arrangements, which includes amounts of borrowings under each line of credit, note payable, commercial paper issue, bonds indenture, debenture issue, own-share lending arrangements and any other contractual agreement to repay funds, and about the underlying arrangements, rationale for a classification as long-term, including repayment terms, interest rates, collateral provided, restrictions on use of assets and activities, whether or not in compliance with debt covenants, and other matters important to users of the financial statements, such as the effects of refinancing and noncompliance with debt covenants.

role.label: Debt Instrument [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Schedule of Long-Term Debt Instruments [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about long-term debt instrument or arrangement.

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling After Five Through Ten Years, Percentage
role.documentation: Allocated percentage of investment in debt security, with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling sixth through tenth year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling After One Through Five Years, Percentage
role.documentation: Allocated percentage of investment in debt security, with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year through fifth year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling After Ten Years, Percentage
role.documentation: Allocated percentage of investment in debt security, with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after rolling tenth year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

role.terseLabel: Current marketable securities held in escrow and restricted from general use
role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Restricted
role.documentation: Amount of restricted investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Derivative Contract [Domain]
role.documentation: Financial instrument or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

role.label: Derivative Instrument [Axis]

role.label: Dividends
role.documentation: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

role.label: Document Fiscal Period Focus
role.documentation: Fiscal period values are FY, Q1, Q2, and Q3. 1st, 2nd and 3rd quarter 10-Q or 10-QT statements have value Q1, Q2, and Q3 respectively, with 10-K, 10-KT or other fiscal year statements having FY.

role.label: Document Fiscal Year Focus
role.documentation: This is focus fiscal year of the document report in YYYY format. For a 2006 annual report, which may also provide financial information from prior periods, fiscal 2006 should be given as the fiscal year focus. Example: 2006.

role.label: Document Period End Date
role.documentation: For the EDGAR submission types of Form 8-K: the date of the report, the date of the earliest event reported; for the EDGAR submission types of Form N-1A: the filing date; for all other submission types: the end of the reporting or transition period. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.

role.label: Document Quarterly Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as an quarterly report.

role.label: Document Transition Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as a transition report.

role.label: Document Type
role.documentation: The type of document being provided (such as 10-K, 10-Q, 485BPOS, etc). The document type is limited to the same value as the supporting SEC submission type, or the word 'Other'.

role.label: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year [Member]

role.verboseLabel: Basic earnings per share (in dollars per share)

role.verboseLabel: Diluted earnings per share (in dollars per share)

role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

role.label: Earnings Per Share [Text Block]

role.label: Entities [Table]
role.documentation: Container to assemble all relevant information about each entity associated with the document instance

role.label: Entity Address, Address Line One
role.documentation: Address Line 1 such as Attn, Building Name, Street Name

role.label: Entity Address, City or Town
role.documentation: Name of the City or Town

role.label: Entity Address, Postal Zip Code
role.documentation: Code for the postal or zip code

role.label: Entity Address, State or Province
role.documentation: Name of the state or province.

role.label: Entity Central Index Key
role.documentation: A unique 10-digit SEC-issued value to identify entities that have filed disclosures with the SEC. It is commonly abbreviated as CIK.

role.terseLabel: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding (in shares)
role.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
role.documentation: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

role.label: Entity Current Reporting Status
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' whether registrants (1) have filed all reports required to be filed by Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that registrants were required to file such reports), and (2) have been subject to such filing requirements for the past 90 days. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.label: Entity Emerging Growth Company
role.documentation: Indicate if registrant meets the emerging growth company criteria.

role.label: Entity File Number
role.documentation: Commission file number. The field allows up to 17 characters. The prefix may contain 1-3 digits, the sequence number may contain 1-8 digits, the optional suffix may contain 1-4 characters, and the fields are separated with a hyphen.

role.label: Entity Filer Category
role.documentation: Indicate whether the registrant is one of the following: Large Accelerated Filer, Accelerated Filer, Non-accelerated Filer. Definitions of these categories are stated in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.terseLabel: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.label: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.documentation: Two-character EDGAR code representing the state or country of incorporation.

role.label: Entity Information [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Entity Interactive Data Current
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant has submitted electronically every Interactive Data File required to be submitted pursuant to Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to submit such files).

role.label: Entity Registrant Name
role.documentation: The exact name of the entity filing the report as specified in its charter, which is required by forms filed with the SEC.

role.label: Entity Shell Company
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant is a shell company as defined in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act.

role.label: Entity Small Business
role.documentation: Indicates that the company is a Smaller Reporting Company (SRC).

role.label: Entity Tax Identification Number
role.documentation: The Tax Identification Number (TIN), also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN), is a unique 9-digit value assigned by the IRS.

role.terseLabel: Equity Awards Adjustments, Excluding Value Reported in Compensation Table
role.label: Equity Awards Adjustments, Excluding Value Reported in the Compensation Table [Member]

role.terseLabel: Aggregate Grant Date Fair Value of Equity Award Amounts Reported in Summary Compensation Table
role.label: Aggregate Grant Date Fair Value of Equity Award Amounts Reported in Summary Compensation Table [Member]
Equity Component [Domain]
role.documentation: Components of equity are the parts of the total Equity balance including that which is allocated to common, preferred, treasury stock, retained earnings, etc.

role.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

role.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

role.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Cost
role.documentation: Cost of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI). Excludes equity method investment and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

role.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI
role.documentation: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

role.label: Equity Valuation Assumption Difference, Footnote [Text Block]
Europe Segment [Member]
role.documentation: Europe Segment [Member]

role.label: Fair Value Hierarchy and NAV [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by level within fair value hierarchy and fair value measured at net asset value per share as practical expedient.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 1 [Member]
role.documentation: Quoted prices in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the reporting entity can access at the measurement date.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 2 [Member]
role.documentation: Inputs other than quoted prices included within level 1 that are observable for an asset or liability, either directly or indirectly, including, but not limited to, quoted prices for similar assets or liabilities in active markets, or quoted prices for identical or similar assets or liabilities in inactive markets.

role.label: Fair Value Measurement, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for fair value measurements of financial and non-financial assets, liabilities and instruments classified in shareholders' equity. Disclosures include, but are not limited to, how an entity that manages a group of financial assets and liabilities on the basis of its net exposure measures the fair value of those assets and liabilities.

role.label: Fair Value Hierarchy and NAV [Domain]
role.documentation: Categories used to prioritize the inputs to valuation techniques to measure fair value.

role.terseLabel: Fair Values Derivatives, Balance Sheet Location, by Derivative Contract Type [Table]
role.label: Fair Values Derivatives, Balance Sheet Location, by Derivative Contract Type [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about location and fair value of derivative instrument and nonderivative instrument designated as hedging instrument.

role.label: Financial Instrument [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of financial instrument.

role.label: Financial Instruments [Abstract]
role.documentation: Financial Instruments

role.label: Financial Instruments Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for financial instruments. This disclosure includes, but is not limited to, fair value measurements of short and long term marketable securities, international currencies forward contracts, and auction rate securities. Financial instruments may include hedging and non-hedging currency exchange instruments, derivatives, securitizations and securities available for sale at fair value. Also included are investment results, realized and unrealized gains and losses as well as impairments and risk management disclosures.

role.label: Financial Instruments [Line Items]
role.documentation: Financial Instruments [Line Items]

role.label: Financial Instruments [Table]
role.documentation: Financial Instruments [Table]

role.label: Fiscal Period, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for determining an entity's fiscal year or other fiscal period. This disclosure may include identification of the fiscal period end-date, the length of the fiscal period, any reporting period lag between the entity and its subsidiaries, or equity investees. If a reporting lag exists, the closing date of the entity having a different period end is generally noted, along with an explanation of the necessity for using different closing dates. Any intervening events that materially affect the entity's financial position or results of operations are generally also disclosed.

role.verboseLabel: Hedges of foreign currency exposure associated with revenue and inventory purchases
role.label: Foreign Exchange Contract [Member]
role.documentation: Derivative instrument whose primary underlying risk is tied to foreign exchange rates.

role.label: Debt Security, Government, Non-US [Member]
role.documentation: Debt security issued by government not domiciled in United States of America (US).

role.terseLabel: Forgone Recovery due to Disqualification of Tax Benefits, Amount
role.label: Forgone Recovery due to Disqualification of Tax Benefits, Amount

role.terseLabel: Forgone Recovery due to Expense of Enforcement, Amount
role.label: Forgone Recovery due to Expense of Enforcement, Amount

role.terseLabel: Forgone Recovery due to Violation of Home Country Law, Amount
role.label: Forgone Recovery due to Violation of Home Country Law, Amount
Forgone Recovery, Explanation of Impracticability [Text Block]

role.terseLabel: Prior Year End Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted in Any Prior Year that Fail to Meet Applicable Vesting Conditions During Covered Year
role.label: Prior Year End Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted in Any Prior Year that Fail to Meet Applicable Vesting Conditions During Covered Year [Member]
Greater China Segment [Member]
role.documentation: Greater China Segment [Member]

role.label: Gross Profit
role.documentation: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

role.terseLabel: Carrying amount of hedged term debt
role.label: Hedged Liability, Fair Value Hedge
role.documentation: Amount of liability hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

role.label: Hedging Designation [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by designation of purpose of derivative instrument.

role.label: Hedging Designation [Domain]
role.documentation: Designation of purpose of derivative instrument.

role.label: iPad [Member]
role.documentation: iPad [Member]

role.label: iPhone [Member]
role.documentation: iPhone [Member]

role.totalLabel: Income before provision for income taxes
role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
role.documentation: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

role.label: Income Tax Contingency [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Income Tax Contingency [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about tax positions taken in the tax returns filed or to be filed for which it is more likely than not that the tax position will not be sustained upon examination by taxing authorities and other income tax contingencies. Includes, but is not limited to, interest and penalties, reconciliation of unrecognized tax benefits, unrecognized tax benefits that would affect the effective tax rate, tax years that remain subject to examination by tax jurisdictions, and information about positions for which it is reasonably possible that amounts unrecognized will significantly change within 12 months.

role.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

role.terseLabel: Cash paid for income taxes, net
role.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after refund, of cash paid to foreign, federal, state, and local jurisdictions as income tax.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

role.terseLabel: Changes in operating assets and liabilities:
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital [Abstract]
Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Receivables
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables classified as other.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Stockholders' Equity [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

role.terseLabel: Effect of dilutive share-based awards (in shares)
role.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-Based Payment Arrangements
role.documentation: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures [Line Items]

role.terseLabel: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Adopted
role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Adopted [Flag]

role.terseLabel: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Not Adopted
role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Not Adopted [Text Block]
Interest Rate Contract [Member]
role.documentation: Derivative instrument whose primary underlying risk is tied to the right to receive or pay a sum of money at a given interest rate.

role.label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Net of Reserves
role.documentation: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods held by the company that are readily available for sale.

role.label: Inventory, Net
role.documentation: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Purchased Parts, Net of Reserves
role.documentation: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items purchased for use as components of a finished product or pieces of machinery and equipment plus any items in their natural and unrefined state. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines raw materials and purchased parts into an aggregate amount.

role.label: Japan Segment [Member]
role.documentation: Japan Segment [Member]

role.label: Liabilities
role.documentation: Amount of liability recognized for present obligation requiring transfer or otherwise providing economic benefit to others.

role.label: Liabilities and Equity
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

role.label: Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

role.label: Liabilities, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Local Phone Number
role.documentation: Local phone number for entity.

role.label: Long-Term Debt
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt. Excludes lease obligation.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Current Maturities
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as current. Excludes lease obligation.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Fair Value
role.documentation: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as noncurrent. Excludes lease obligation.

role.label: Loss Contingency Nature [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of existing condition, situation, or set of circumstances involving uncertainty as to possible loss to an enterprise that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events occur or fail to occur.

role.label: Contingencies Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for loss and gain contingencies. Describes any existing condition, situation, or set of circumstances involving uncertainty as of the balance sheet date (or prior to issuance of the financial statements) as to a probable or reasonably possible loss incurred by an entity that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events occur or fail to occur, and typically discloses the amount of loss recorded or a range of possible loss, or an assertion that no reasonable estimate can be made.

role.label: Loss Contingency, Nature [Domain]
role.documentation: An existing condition, situation, or set of circumstances involving uncertainty as to possible loss to an enterprise that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events occur or fail to occur. Resolution of the uncertainty may confirm the incurrence of a loss or impairment of an asset or the incurrence of a liability.

role.label: Mac [Member]
role.documentation: Mac [Member]

role.terseLabel: Marketable debt securities other than mortgage- and asset-backed securities
role.label: Marketable Debt Securities Other Than Asset-Backed Securities [Member]
role.documentation: Marketable Debt Securities Other Than Asset-Backed Securities

role.label: Marketable Securities, Current
role.documentation: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

role.label: Marketable Securities [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Marketable Securities, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as noncurrent.

role.label: Marketable Securities [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about investment in marketable security.

role.label: Segment Reporting, Reconciling Item, Excluding Corporate Nonsegment [Member]
role.documentation: Items used in reconciling reportable segments' amounts to consolidated amount. Excludes corporate-level activity.

role.terseLabel: Maximum length of time over which the Company is hedging its exposure to the variability in future cash flows for foreign currency transactions
role.label: Maximum Length of Time, Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge
role.documentation: Maximum period of hedging exposure to variability in future cash flows for forecasted transaction of foreign currency cash flow hedge, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days. Excludes forecasted transaction for payment of variable interest on existing financial instrument.

role.terseLabel: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value
role.label: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value [Flag]
Money Market Funds [Member]
role.documentation: Fund that invests in short-term money-market instruments, for example, but not limited to, commercial paper, banker's acceptances, repurchase agreements, government securities, certificates of deposit, and other highly liquid securities.

role.label: Material Terms of Trading Arrangement [Text Block]
Mutual Fund [Member]
role.documentation: Regulated investment instrument that pools funds from multiple investors to invest principally in a portfolio of securities and money market instruments to match the investment objective.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations [Abstract]
Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations [Abstract]
Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations [Abstract]
Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

role.label: No Trading Symbol Flag
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a security having no trading symbol.

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
Non-Trade Receivable [Member]
role.documentation: Receivables resulting from the sale of components to manufacturing vendors who manufacture sub-assemblies or assemble final products for the Company.

role.terseLabel: Derivatives not designated as accounting hedges
role.label: Not Designated as Hedging Instrument [Member]
role.documentation: Derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument under Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP).

role.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
role.documentation: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

role.label: Nontrade Receivables, Current
role.documentation: The sum of amounts currently receivable other than from customers. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.terseLabel: Number of vendors that individually represented 10% or more of total vendor non-trade receivables
role.label: Number of Significant Vendors
role.documentation: The number of vendors representing a significant portion of non-trade receivables.

role.label: Operating Expenses
role.documentation: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

role.label: Operating Income (Loss)
role.documentation: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

role.label: Operating Segments [Member]
role.documentation: Identifies components of an entity that engage in business activities from which they may earn revenue and incur expenses, including transactions with other components of the same entity.

role.terseLabel: Organization, Consolidation and Presentation of Financial Statements [Abstract]
role.label: Organization, Consolidation and Presentation of Financial Statements [Abstract]
Other Assets, Current
role.documentation: Amount of current assets classified as other.

role.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

role.terseLabel: Change in unrealized gains/losses on marketable debt securities, net of tax:
role.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax [Abstract]

role.terseLabel: Change in unrealized gains/losses on derivative instruments, net of tax:
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Total change in unrealized gains/losses on marketable debt securities
role.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

role.totalLabel: Total change in unrealized gains/losses on derivative instruments
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.terseLabel: Change in fair value of derivative instruments
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification, after Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Adjustment for net (gains)/losses realized and included in net income
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, after Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

role.terseLabel: Change in fair value of derivative instruments
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative Instrument, Gain (Loss), Before Reclassification, After Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as accounting hedge.

role.negatedLabel: Adjustment for net (gains)/losses realized and included in net income
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative Instrument, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, after Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as accounting hedge.

role.totalLabel: Total change in unrealized gains/losses on derivative instruments
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative Instrument, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as accounting hedge.

role.terseLabel: Change in foreign currency translation, net of tax
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
role.documentation: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

role.negatedLabel: Adjustment for net (gains)/losses realized and included in net income
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
role.documentation: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

role.terseLabel: Change in fair value of marketable debt securities
role.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

role.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
role.documentation: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

role.label: Other Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
role.documentation: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

role.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

role.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
role.documentation: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

role.negatedLabel: Payments for dividends and dividend equivalents
role.label: Payments of Dividends
role.documentation: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

role.negatedLabel: Payments for taxes related to net share settlement of equity awards
role.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-Based Payment Arrangement
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.negatedLabel: Payments for acquisition of property, plant and equipment
role.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
role.documentation: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

role.terseLabel: Peer Group Total Shareholder Return Amount
role.label: Peer Group Total Shareholder Return Amount

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from maturities of marketable securities
role.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

role.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Commercial Paper
role.documentation: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from issuing (borrowing) and repaying commercial paper.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from sales of marketable securities
role.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Product [Member]
role.documentation: Article or substance produced by nature, labor or machinery.

role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
role.documentation: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

role.totalLabel: Total property, plant and equipment, net
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
role.documentation: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Includes, but is not limited to, balances by class of assets, depreciation and depletion expense and method used, including composite depreciation, and accumulated deprecation.

role.terseLabel: Reconciliation of Operating Profit (Loss) from Segments to Consolidated [Table]
role.label: Reconciliation of Operating Profit (Loss) from Segments to Consolidated [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about the reconciliation of profit (loss) from reportable segments to the consolidated income (loss) before income tax expense (benefit) and discontinued operations. Includes, but is not limited to, reconciliation after income tax if income tax is allocated to the reportable segment.

role.terseLabel: Reconciliation of Segment Operating Income to the Condensed Consolidated Statements of Operations
role.label: Reconciliation of Operating Profit (Loss) from Segments to Consolidated [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of the reconciliation of profit (loss) from reportable segments to the consolidated income (loss) before income tax expense (benefit) and discontinued operations. Includes, but is not limited to, reconciliation after income tax if income tax is allocated to the reportable segment.

role.label: Recovery of Erroneously Awarded Compensation Disclosure [Line Items]
Repayments of Long-Term Debt
role.documentation: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Research and Development Expense
role.documentation: Amount of expense for research and development. Includes, but is not limited to, cost for computer software product to be sold, leased, or otherwise marketed and writeoff of research and development assets acquired in transaction other than business combination or joint venture formation or both. Excludes write-down of intangible asset acquired in business combination or from joint venture formation or both, used in research and development activity.

role.label: Rest of Asia Pacific Segment [Member]
role.documentation: Rest of Asia Pacific Segment [Member]

role.label: Restatement Does Not Require Recovery [Text Block]

role.terseLabel: Cash and cash equivalents held in escrow and restricted from general use
role.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Restricted Stock Units (RSUs) [Member]
role.documentation: Share instrument which is convertible to stock or an equivalent amount of cash, after a specified period of time or when specified performance conditions are met.

role.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
role.documentation: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit).

role.label: Retained Earnings [Member]
role.documentation: Accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit).

role.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
role.documentation: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

role.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure of revenue from contract with customer to transfer good or service and to transfer nonfinancial asset. Includes, but is not limited to, disaggregation of revenue, credit loss recognized from contract with customer, judgment and change in judgment related to contract with customer, and asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer. Excludes insurance and lease contracts.

role.terseLabel: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Expected Timing of Satisfaction [Line Items]
role.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Expected Timing of Satisfaction [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.terseLabel: Deferred revenue, expected timing of realization, period
role.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Expected Timing of Satisfaction, Period
role.documentation: Period in which remaining performance obligation is expected to be recognized as revenue, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.terseLabel: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Expected Timing of Satisfaction, Start Date [Axis]
role.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Expected Timing of Satisfaction, Start Date [Axis]
role.documentation: Start date of time band for expected timing of satisfaction of remaining performance obligation, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

role.terseLabel: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Expected Timing of Satisfaction [Table]
role.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Expected Timing of Satisfaction [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about expected timing for satisfying remaining performance obligation.

role.terseLabel: Deferred revenue, expected timing of realization, percentage
role.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Percentage
role.documentation: Percentage of remaining performance obligation to total remaining performance obligation not recognized as revenue.

role.terseLabel: Cash, Cash Equivalents and Marketable Securities by Significant Investment Category
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents and Investments [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of the components of cash, cash equivalents, and investments.

role.terseLabel: Share-Based Compensation Expense and the Related Income Tax Benefit
role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Cost by Plan [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of cost recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement by plan. Includes, but is not limited to, related tax benefit.

role.terseLabel: Computation of Basic and Diluted Earnings Per Share
role.label: Schedule of Earnings Per Share, Basic and Diluted [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of an entity's basic and diluted earnings per share calculations, including a reconciliation of numerators and denominators of the basic and diluted per-share computations for income from continuing operations.

role.label: Schedule of Inventory, Current [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.

role.label: Schedule of Nonvested Restricted Stock Units Activity [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of the changes in outstanding nonvested restricted stock units.

role.terseLabel: Notional Amounts of Outstanding Derivative Instruments
role.label: Schedule of Notional Amounts of Outstanding Derivative Positions [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of the notional amounts of outstanding derivative positions.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Segment Reporting Information, by Segment [Table]
role.label: Schedule of Segment Reporting Information, by Segment [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about profit (loss) and total assets by reportable segment.

role.label: Schedule of Segment Reporting Information, by Segment [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of the profit or loss and total assets for each reportable segment. An entity discloses certain information on each reportable segment if the amounts (a) are included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) are otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award [Table]
role.label: Schedule of Share-Based Compensation Arrangements by Share-Based Payment Award [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Title of 12(b) Security
role.documentation: Title of a 12(b) registered security.

role.label: Security Exchange Name
role.documentation: Name of the Exchange on which a security is registered.

role.label: Segments [Domain]
role.documentation: Components of an entity that engage in business activities from which they may earn revenue and incur expenses, including transactions with other components of the same entity.

role.label: Segment Reporting Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for reporting segments including data and tables. Reportable segments include those that meet any of the following quantitative thresholds a) it's reported revenue, including sales to external customers and intersegment sales or transfers is 10 percent or more of the combined revenue, internal and external, of all operating segments b) the absolute amount of its reported profit or loss is 10 percent or more of the greater, in absolute amount of 1) the combined reported profit of all operating segments that did not report a loss or 2) the combined reported loss of all operating segments that did report a loss c) its assets are 10 percent or more of the combined assets of all operating segments.

role.label: Segment Reporting Information [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.terseLabel: Segment Reporting, Reconciling Item for Operating Profit (Loss) from Segment to Consolidated [Line Items]
role.label: Segment Reporting, Reconciling Item for Operating Profit (Loss) from Segment to Consolidated [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
role.documentation: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

role.label: Service [Member]
role.documentation: Assistance, including, but not limited to, technology, license and maintenance, license and service, maintenance, oil and gas, and financial service.

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
role.documentation: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period
role.documentation: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that were forfeited during the reporting period.

role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeitures, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
role.documentation: Weighted average fair value as of the grant date of equity-based award plans other than stock (unit) option plans that were not exercised or put into effect as a result of the occurrence of a terminating event.

role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
role.documentation: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
role.documentation: The weighted average fair value at grant date for nonvested equity-based awards issued during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
role.documentation: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
role.documentation: Per share or unit weighted-average fair value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

role.terseLabel: Weighted-Average Grant-Date Fair Value Per RSU
role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value [Abstract]
Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
role.documentation: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

role.terseLabel: Total vesting-date fair value of RSUs
role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Fair Value
role.documentation: Fair value of share-based awards for which the grantee gained the right by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash.

role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
role.documentation: The weighted average fair value as of grant date pertaining to an equity-based award plan other than a stock (or unit) option plan for which the grantee gained the right during the reporting period, by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash in accordance with the terms of the arrangement.

role.terseLabel: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award [Line Items]
role.label: Share-Based Compensation Arrangement by Share-Based Payment Award [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Award Type [Domain]
role.documentation: Award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Short-Term Debt, Type [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of short-term debt arrangement.

role.label: Short-Term Debt, Type [Domain]
role.documentation: Type of short-term debt arrangement, such as notes, line of credit, commercial paper, asset-based financing, project financing, letter of credit financing.

role.label: Segments [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by business segments.

role.label: Class of Stock [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by the different classes of stock of the entity.

role.label: Equity Components [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by component of equity.

role.label: Statement [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Statement [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about statement of comprehensive income, income, other comprehensive income, financial position, cash flows, and shareholders' equity.

role.terseLabel: Stock Price or TSR Estimation Method
role.label: Stock Price or TSR Estimation Method [Text Block]
Stock Appreciation Rights (SARs) [Member]
role.documentation: Right to receive cash or shares equal to appreciation of predetermined number of grantor's shares during predetermined time period.

role.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
role.documentation: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

role.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
role.documentation: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

role.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
role.documentation: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

role.label: Equity, Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount of equity (deficit) attributable to parent. Excludes temporary equity and equity attributable to noncontrolling interest.

role.label: Equity [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for equity.

role.terseLabel: Total Shareholder Return Vs Peer Group
role.label: Total Shareholder Return Vs Peer Group [Text Block]
Trade Accounts Receivable [Member]
role.documentation: Amount due from customers or clients for goods or services that have been delivered or sold in the normal course of business.

role.label: Trading Symbol
role.documentation: Trading symbol of an instrument as listed on an exchange.

role.label: Financial Instruments [Domain]
role.documentation: Instrument or contract that imposes a contractual obligation to deliver cash or another financial instrument or to exchange other financial instruments on potentially unfavorable terms and conveys a contractual right to receive cash or another financial instrument or to exchange other financial instruments on potentially favorable terms.

role.label: Trading Arrangement, Securities Aggregate Available Amount
US Government Agencies Debt Securities [Member]
role.documentation: Debentures, notes, and other debt securities issued by US government agencies, for example, but not limited to, Government National Mortgage Association (GNMA or Ginnie Mae). Excludes US treasury securities and debt issued by government-sponsored Enterprises (GSEs), for example, but is not limited to, Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation (FHLMC or Freddie Mac), Federal National Mortgage Association (FNMA or Fannie Mae), and the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

role.label: US States and Political Subdivisions Debt Securities [Member]
role.documentation: Bonds or similar securities issued by state, city, or local US governments or the agencies operated by state, city, or local governments. Debt securities issued by state governments may include bond issuances of US state authorities including, for example, but not limited to, housing authorities, dormitory authorities, and general obligations while debt securities issued by political subdivisions of US states would include, for example, debt issuances by county, borough, city, or municipal governments.

role.label: US Treasury Securities [Member]
role.documentation: This category includes information about debt securities issued by the United States Department of the Treasury and backed by the United States government. Such securities primarily consist of treasury bills (short-term maturities - one year or less), treasury notes (intermediate term maturities - two to ten years), and treasury bonds (long-term maturities - ten to thirty years).

role.label: Underlying Security Market Price Change, Percent

role.terseLabel: Unfavorable investigation outcome, EU State Aid rules
role.label: Unfavorable Investigation Outcome, EU State Aid Rules [Member]
role.documentation: Unfavorable Investigation Outcome, EU State Aid Rules [Member]

role.label: Vendor One [Member]
role.documentation: Vendor One [Member]

role.label: Vendor Two [Member]
role.documentation: Vendor Two [Member]

role.terseLabel: Vesting Date Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted and Vested in Covered Year
role.label: Vesting Date Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted and Vested in Covered Year [Member]
Wearables, Home and Accessories [Member]
role.documentation: Wearables, Home and Accessories [Member]

role.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
role.documentation: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

role.verboseLabel: Shares used in computing earnings per share:
role.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted [Abstract]
Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
role.documentation: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

role.terseLabel: Year-end Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted in Covered Year that are Outstanding and Unvested
role.label: Year-end Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted in Covered Year that are Outstanding and Unvested [Member]
